item.description:
I have wanted to see this movie. If Friday does not work, maybe next week?

THE SECRET OF KELLS (NR)

(Ireland/France, 2009) Directed by Tomm Moore and Nora Twomey. Screenplay by Fabrice Ziolkowski. With the voices of: Evan McGuire, Mick Lally, Christen Mooney, Brendan Gleeson, Liam Hourican, Paul Tylak

Never before have fans of classic hand-drawn animation, Celtic mythology, the incomparable Book of Kells, and 9th century Ireland had one film to that could thrill all of the above! Nominated for an Academy Award but without the wherewithal to afford a wide release, The Secret of the Kells is winning under-the-radar raves at independent movie theaters. Young Brendan is apprenticed to his imposing uncle, an Abbot in a fortress built to withstand the Vikings. Enter a younger monk/artist (voiced by Brendan Gleason), who encourages the curious young buachaill to explore the surrounding forest, populated by wild animals, Druids, elves, and Aisling, a mysterious wolf-girl. This animated gem is appropriate for pantheists of all ages. Winner, Audience Award at the Edinburgh International Film Festival. "The Secret of Kells is a magical adventure unlike anything we've seen on screen before." Claudia Puig, USA Today. 75 min.
http://www.gkids.tv/k...
